analysis.key_quote: The way that this Administration has conducted personnel matters so far shows that this rule is designed to purge anyone from the government with any expertise that might criticize the shortsighted and foolish (not to mention unconstitutional and illegal) cuts to congressionally-funded programs and departments.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization, loss of expertise, and the undermining of merit-based systems, which aligns with the indicators for opposition.
